result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Stuart M Fairchild

defendant.name: Fairchild, Stuart M
defendant.address: 4982 Indian Trail Rd, Port Washington, WI 53074

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt:
Defendant Stuart M Fairchild in court with Attorney Michael H. Kopp.  Adam Yale Gerol appeared for the State of Wisconsin.
State requests this matter dismissed but read-in.
Court so grants.

Defendant Stuart M Fairchild in court with attorney Michael H. Kopp.  Defendant in custody. Patricia Clare Bradford appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Counsel requests adjournment to receive a global offer from the State.  Bail motion heard re: 15CM423; 15CM431; 15CM459. State opposes any reduction in bail. Court denies bail motion.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for August 13, 2015 at 01:45 pm.
SCRAM - Non-Compliant.   Scanned/emailed to D.A.'s office, faxed to Attorney Kopp and forwarded to Branch 3.
SCRAM Non-Compliant.  Emailed to DA and faxed to Atty Kopp.  Scanned & forwarded to B3.
SCRAM - NonCompliant.  Copy emailed to DA and faxed to defense counsel.  Scanned & forwarded to B3.
Court orders absolute sobriety.   Defendant shall not operate a motor vehicle without a valid driver's license. No possession/consumption of any intoxicants.Remain on SCRAM program

Defendant Stuart M Fairchild in court with Attorney Michael Kopp.  Jeffrey A Sisley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Counsel waives reading and enters not guilty plea.  Jeffrey A Sisley appeared for the State of Wisconsin.  Plea/sentencing hearing scheduled for July 16, 2015 at 01:15 pm.
